arguments.body:
## Your Quick‑Read Daily News Digest

**1. [Breakthrough in AI‑generated protein folding](https://www.technologyreview.com/2025/09/01/ai-protein-folding/)**

A new AI algorithm now predicts protein structures with unprecedented accuracy, speeding up drug discovery.

---

**2. [Major climate‑policy summit reaches new agreement](https://www.npr.org/2025/09/02/climate-summit-agreement/)**

The Global Climate Summit adopted a treaty to slash carbon emissions by 45% within ten years, backed by major renewable‑energy investments.

---

**3. [Wall Street rallies after tech earnings beat expectations](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/09/01/finance/tech-earnings-rally.html)**

Tech earnings beat expectations, sparking a strong rally on Wall Street and boosting sector confidence.

---

*You are receiving this because you subscribed to the Quick‑Read Daily Digest.*
